019package com.bewsoftware.utils;
020
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.util.Properties;
023
024/**
025 * Provides access to some of the project's pom.properties.
026 * <p>
027 * To setup in a new project:</p>
028 * <ol>
029 * <li>Create a new file: "pom.properties" <br>
030 * Location: "src/main/resources"
031 * <p>
032 * </li>
033 * <li><p>
034 * Place the following text into that file, and save it:</p>
035 * <pre>
036 *<code>
037 *title=${project.name}
038 *description=${project.description}
039 *artifactId=${project.artifactId}
040 *groupId=${project.groupId}
041 *version=${project.version}
042 *filename=${project.build.finalName}.jar
043 *</code>
044 * </pre>
045 * </li><li><p>
046 * Add the following to your projects <b>pom.xml</b> file:</p>
047 * <pre>
048 *<code>
049 *&lt;build&gt;
050 *    &lt;resources&gt;
051 *        ...
052 *        &lt;resource&gt;
053 *            &lt;directory&gt;src/main/resources&lt;/directory&gt;
054 *            &lt;filtering&gt;true&lt;/filtering&gt;
055 *            &lt;includes&gt;
056 *                &lt;include&gt;&#42;&#42;/pom.properties&lt;/include&gt;
057 *            &lt;/includes&gt;
058 *        &lt;/resource&gt;
059 *        &lt;resource&gt;
060 *            &lt;directory&gt;src/main/resources&lt;/directory&gt;
061 *            &lt;filtering&gt;false&lt;/filtering&gt;
062 *            &lt;excludes&gt;
063 *                &lt;exclude&gt;&#42;&#42;/pom.properties&lt;/exclude&gt;
064 *            &lt;/excludes&gt;
065 *        &lt;/resource&gt;
066 *    &lt;/resources&gt;
067 *        ...
068 *&lt;/build&gt;
069 *</code>
070 * </pre>
071 * </li>
072 * </ol>
073 * <p>
074 * To access the properties:
075 * </p>
076 * <pre><code>
077 * POMProperties pom = POMProperties.INSTANCE;
078 * System.out.println(pom.title):
079 * </code></pre>
080 *
081 * @author <a href="mailto:bw.opensource@yahoo.com">Bradley Willcott</a>
082 *
083 * @since 0.1
084 * @version 1.0
085 */
086public final class POMProperties
087{
088
089    /**
090     * Provides single instance of this class.
091     */
092    public final static POMProperties INSTANCE = new POMProperties();
093
094    /**
095     * The identifier for this artifact that is unique within
096     * the group given by the group ID.
097     */
098    public final String artifactId;
099
100    /**
101     * Project Description
102     */
103    public final String description;
104
105    /**
106     * The filename of the binary output file.
107     * <p>
108     * This is usually a '.jar' file.
109     * </p>
110     */
111    public final String filename;
112
113    /**
114     * Project GroupId
115     */
116    public final String groupId;
117
118    /**
119     * Project Name
120     */
121    public final String title;
122
123    /**
124     * The version of the artifact.
125     */
126    public final String version;
127
128    private POMProperties()
129    {
130        Properties properties = new Properties();
131        try
132        {
133            properties.load(POMProperties.class.getResourceAsStream("/pom.properties"));
134        } catch (IOException ex)
135        {
136            throw new RuntimeException("FileIOError", ex);
137        }
138
139        title = properties.getProperty("title");
140        description = properties.getProperty("description");
141        version = properties.getProperty("version");
142        artifactId = properties.getProperty("artifactId");
143        groupId = properties.getProperty("groupId");
144        filename = properties.getProperty("filename");
145    }
146
147    public static void main(String[] args)
148    {
149        System.out.println(POMProperties.INSTANCE);
150    }
151
152    @Override
153    public String toString()
154    {
155        return new StringBuilder(POMProperties.class.getName()).append(":\n")
156                .append("  title: ").append(title).append("\n")
157                .append("  description: ").append(description).append("\n")
158                .append("  groupId: ").append(groupId).append("\n")
159                .append("  artifactId: ").append(artifactId).append("\n")
160                .append("  version: ").append(version).append("\n")
161                .append("  filename: ").append(filename).append("\n").toString();
162    }
163}
